attributes.action: Ban Travelling between Tiers apart from essential travel for work.
attributes.additional_details: Too many people ignoring the rules and still travelling between tiers. The only way to stop this is to stop travel and fine people that are ignoring the rules. The quicker the rate is reduced nationally the quicker the economy can get back to normal.
attributes.background: Ban Travel between Tiers to help reduce the spread  of Coronavirus. Only allowed to travel for essentials like work (if they can't work from home).

rejection.details:
Since you started your petition the Government has announced a national lockdown, including a ban on non-essential travel.

You can read the Prime Minister's announcement of new Covid-19 restrictions here: https://www.gov.uk/government/speeches/prime-ministers-address-to-the-nation-4-january-2021
